mapper.insert: insert into file_dto ( fileid, hash, dir, fullpath, filename, filehash, filesize, create_member_name, create_dateline, last_member_name, last_dateline, property, uploadserver, uri, preview, thumbnail, tag, doctype, doccode ) values ( file_dto_seq.nextval, #{fileDto.hash}, #{fileDto.dir}, #{fileDto.fullpath}, #{fileDto.filename}, #{fileDto.filehash}, #{fileDto.filesize}, #{fileDto.create_member_name}, #{fileDto.create_dateline}, #{fileDto.last_member_name}, #{fileDto.last_dateline}, #{fileDto.property}, #{fileDto.uploadserver}, #{fileDto.uri}, #{fileDto.preview}, #{fileDto.thumbnail}, #{fileDto.tag}, #{fileDto.doctype}, #{fileDto.doccode} )
mapper.delete: delete from file_dto fd where fd.fileid = #{fileDto.fileid}
